description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              OBJECTIVE: We are looking for an experienced Senior Marketing Executive who is passionate about uncovering consumer/ fans insights and delivering innovative marketing campaigns. You will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment and you will generate strategies that grow market share and brand’s reputation, improve customer/ fans experience and drive growth.
              

              KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
              
              1.	Branding
              
              o	Working closely with all parts of the company to ensure commercial goals of the brand are met.
              
              o	Oversee marketing and advertising activities to ensure consistency with brand strategy/ voice.
              
              o	Developing high quality and effective marketing materials that align correctly with the overall brand strategy.
              

              2.	Marketing
              
              o	Managing all marketing for the company and activities within the marketing department.
              
              o	Creation and publication of all marketing material in line with marketing plans.
              
              o	Coordinating in planning and implementing promotional campaigns.
              
              o	Preparing online and print marketing campaigns.
              
              o	Monitor and report on effectiveness of marketing communications.
              
              o	Creating a wide range of different marketing materials.
              

              3.	Communication
              
              o	Implementing communications plans to increase brand awareness and recognition for the organisation.
              
              o	Produce valuable and engaging content for our website and social media that attracts and converts our target groups.
              
              o	Monitoring press stories relating to the company and its brand and maximising opportunities for positive PR and playing down any negative PR.
              
              o	Working closely with design team and media team.
              

              4.	Other
              
              o	Monitor market trends, research markets and competitors’ activities to identify opportunities and key issues.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              o	Proven experience as similar roles.
              
              o	Having sports knowledge is a plus.
              
              o	Professional judgment and discretion that comes from years of experience in the field
              
              o	Knowledge and experience in all aspects of marketing and corporate communications is required.
              
              o	Creative flair, up-to-date knowledge of industry and a professional approach to time, costs and deadlines are a must.
              
              o	Ability to think ‘out of the box’ to generate new ideas and see through its implementation/completion
